name: Raise Me (Itch.io Version)
description:
(BASED ON RAISE A FLOPPA)

You are the proud owner of me! Congrats!!!! You can feed me!!!!! Click me for money!!!!!! And invite friends to house!!!!! We have good times with me!!!!!

BUT Don't let me starve....I'm warning you :) - Me <3

Also, check out the crazy games version with the same name!!!!! :)))))

(But with (Crazy Games Version) At the end!)
